Ỳperēphanìaz Myzè̄rhion. Or, Machiavil redivivus Being an exact discovery or narrative of the priciples & politicks of our bejesuited modern phanaticks. By J. Yalden Esq; Yalden, John.
[24], 117, [3] p.
printed for Will. Cademan, at the Popes head in the New Exchange, London : 1681.
The first two words of title are in Greek. With errata on p. [23] and table of contents at end of text. With marginal notes. Reproduction of the original at the Bodleian Library.
=======
